3.caption_en:
An illustrated "Valuation Pyramid" by NfX showing major tech company logos arranged by valuation tiers ($1–10B, $10–100B, $100+B). The pyramid groups well-known company logos across three valuation bands.

4.caption_en:
A triangular "Valuation Pyramid" infographic from NfX grouping major tech company logos by estimated valuation tiers ($1–10B, $10–100B, $100+B). The pyramid shows top-tier giants (Google, Facebook, Tencent, Microsoft, Amazon/Alibaba) and numerous mid- and lower-tier consumer tech brands arranged by valuation.

5.caption_en:
This slide explains that network effects drive platform market dominance and have generated roughly 70% of tech's value creation over the last 23 years, urging startups to build network effects or rethink their strategy.

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation_slide",
  "title": "The success of those platforms are mainly driven by network effects creating hyperscaling monopolies",
  "definition_heading": "DEFINITION",
  "definition_text": "NETWORK EFFECTS OCCURS WHEN A PRODUCT OR A SERVICE BECOMES MORE VALUABLE TO IT’S USERS AS MORE PEOPLE USE IT",
  "statistic": "In the last 23 years, network effects have accounted for 70% of the value creation in tech",
  "tagline": "If Your Startup Doesn't Have Network Effects, You Need to Rethink Your Strategy.",
  "layout": "two-column",
  "visuals": [
    {
      "id": "left_panel",
      "type": "illustration",
      "position": "left",
      "description": "Dark rectangular panel with the definition at top and a platform diagram below showing a central 'PLATFORM' rectangle, a 'Consumer' box on the left and a 'Producer' box on the right, with circular plus nodes and arrows labeled 'users' and 'attraction' indicating bidirectional network effects.",
      "colors": {
        "background": "dark slate",
        "platform": "teal",
        "consumer_box": "lime green",
        "producer_box": "coral"
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "right_panel",
      "type": "image",
      "position": "right",
      "description": "A 'Valuation Pyramid' graphic containing multiple company logos arranged by valuation tiers to illustrate examples of network-effect-driven companies.",
      "label": "Valuation Pyramid"
    }
  ],
  "design_notes": {
    "headline_style": "large bold dark blue",
    "body_style": "all-caps italic for definition",
    "overall_color_palette": [
      "dark slate",
      "teal",
      "lime green",
      "coral",
      "white"
    ]
  }
}
